BackstoryDef.title: hunter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked, trapped, and killed animals for their meat and leather. [PAWN_nameDef] used both ranged and melee weapons and sometimes hunted alongside wild animals, embodying the savage spirit of the greenskins.

BackstoryDef.title: logger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] chopped trees and hauled lumber back to the clan. Wielding [PAWN_possessive] axe with both artistry and brute force, [PAWN_pronoun] exemplified the rugged determination of the greenskin people.

BackstoryDef.title: gatherer
BackstoryDef.description: With an innate knowledge of plants, roots, and berries, [PAWN_nameDef] could forage even in the harshest lands. [PAWN_pronoun] shunned the hunt, relying instead on nature’s bounty—a trait prized among the greenskins.

BackstoryDef.title: weaver
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] mastered the craft of working wool, plant fibers, and natural dyes into distinctive garments that bore the mark of greenskin culture. [PAWN_pronoun]'s textiles were both practical and a point of pride.

BackstoryDef.title: framer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] built shelters and settlements for the clan—from temporary encampments to permanent dwellings—using materials gathered from the wild.

BackstoryDef.title: stew keeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] prepared hearty meals from the tribe’s gathered bounty. [PAWN_pronoun] ensured every dish was calorie-dense and long-lasting—a vital skill for survival in the greenskin wilds. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] even foraged the herbs [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: tamer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] forged a deep bond with the wild beasts roaming the lands. [PAWN_pronoun] tamed and cared for these animals, embodying the fierce yet respectful nature of the greenskin tradition.

BackstoryDef.title: carver
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] carved intricate artworks from wood, stone, and other natural materials. [PAWN_pronoun]'s creations beautified clan settlements and enriched greenskin rituals.

BackstoryDef.title: healer
BackstoryDef.description: When the clan’s elder healer fell in battle, [PAWN_nameDef] stepped forward to care for the wounded. Scavenging herbs and natural remedies from the wild, [PAWN_pronoun] preserved the health of the greenskin people.

BackstoryDef.title: hearth tender
BackstoryDef.description: While the clan ventured out to hunt and forage, [PAWN_nameDef] stayed behind to cook and care for the young and infirm, keeping the home hearth burning strong in true greenskin fashion.

BackstoryDef.title: warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearsome combatant, mastering both melee and ranged warfare in countless battles—a true embodiment of greenskin savagery.

BackstoryDef.title: scout
BackstoryDef.description: Contact with outlanders taught [PAWN_nameDef] to navigate the wild lands. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to resources—skills honed on the frontier of greenskin territory.

BackstoryDef.title: vengeful hunter
BackstoryDef.description: After losing a dear friend to a vicious animal attack, [PAWN_nameDef] tracked down the beast and sought retribution. [PAWN_pronoun] faced not only nature’s fury but also betrayal by those who wore the beast’s pelt as a trophy.

BackstoryDef.title: muffalo shaman
BackstoryDef.description: Endowed with quiet wisdom and raw strength, [PAWN_nameDef] became the spiritual guide of the clan by forging a deep connection with the great spirit.

BackstoryDef.title: banished
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out from [PAWN_possessive] clan after a bitter, bloody dispute. Forced to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to endure the hardships of exile in the wild greenskin lands.

BackstoryDef.title: banished sick
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out when [PAWN_pronoun] fell gravely ill — a fate for the sick in greenskin society, exiled to die alone. Against all odds, [PAWN_pronoun] survived the harsh isolation and eventually reclaimed [PAWN_possessive] rightful place in the clan.

BackstoryDef.title: butcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] became an expert in processing animal carcasses, ensuring every part was used. Swift and precise with a blade, [PAWN_pronoun] exemplified the brutal efficiency of greenskin warfare.

BackstoryDef.title: Escaped Slave
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by humans and forced to labor in the mining pits. In a brutal uprising, [PAWN_pronoun] fought to break free from the chains of slavery and defied the odds to reclaim [PAWN_possessive] rightful place among the Greenskins.

BackstoryDef.title: Honored Warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] fought valiantly on the battlefield, earning honor and a reputation for deadly melee prowess.

BackstoryDef.title: Star Reader
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent long nights studying the skies, interpreting the movement of the stars to guide the tribe’s fate and enhance social bonds.

BackstoryDef.title: Warlord’s Right Hand
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as the trusted aide to a fearsome warlord, executing orders with unwavering loyalty and deadly efficiency.

BackstoryDef.title: Banished Greenskin
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out of the clan for breaking sacred customs. Despite the exile, [PAWN_pronoun] survived in the wild and now seeks to reclaim honor.

BackstoryDef.title: Shaman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] possesses deep spiritual insight and guides the tribe through rituals and omens, communing with the ancestral spirits.

BackstoryDef.title: Shaman's Apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth learning the sacred traditions from the tribe’s shaman, showing promise in the mystical arts.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal Warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] fought countless battles defending the clan and honed [PAWN_possessive] combat skills in the heat of tribal warfare.

BackstoryDef.title: Brute
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] relies on raw physical strength and overwhelming force to intimidate foes and crush enemies in battle.

BackstoryDef.title: Pathfinder
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is adept at navigating the wilds, uncovering hidden trails and secret sanctuaries that many have overlooked.

BackstoryDef.title: Skywatcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spends long nights studying the heavens, interpreting celestial signs to guide [PAWN_possessive] people.

BackstoryDef.title: Guardian of the Fire
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been entrusted with the sacred duty of tending the eternal flame—a symbol of the tribe’s spirit and resilience.

BackstoryDef.title: Warchief Spokesman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as the mouthpiece for the clan’s leader, negotiating with rivals and rallying the warriors with persuasive force.

BackstoryDef.title: Legendary Champion
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to legendary status through unmatched combat skill and ferocity. [PAWN_pronoun] is revered for [PAWN_possessive] near-mythical melee prowess.

BackstoryDef.title: Guardian of the Elder Tree
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been charged with protecting the ancient elder tree—a sacred symbol of the tribe’s origins and wisdom.

BackstoryDef.title: Wanderer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] roams the wilds, never staying in one place for long. [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own, gathering wisdom and skill from every journey.

BackstoryDef.title: Cursed Bloodline
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] bears a dark curse in [PAWN_possessive] lineage—one that brings misfortune and hardship. Yet [PAWN_pronoun] strives to overcome the stigma and prove [PAWN_possessive] worth.

BackstoryDef.title: Former Warchief
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once led the clan as warchief but was forced to step down. Highly respected despite the loss of power, [PAWN_pronoun] still wields considerable influence.

BackstoryDef.title: Pit Fighter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by humans and forced to fight for sport in brutal pits. In a desperate struggle, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to escape the arena, forever scarred by [PAWN_possessive] time as a fighter for entertainment.

BackstoryDef.title: Berserker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enters battle with a wild, uncontrollable fury, overcoming pain and fighting with relentless, savage force.

BackstoryDef.title: Savage Raider
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is feared for [PAWN_possessive] ruthless raids on rival settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] fights with a mix of cunning and savagery, leaving devastation in [PAWN_possessive] wake.

BackstoryDef.title: Glory Seeker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is driven by an insatiable desire for honor and fame, constantly seeking out battles and challenges in hopes of securing eternal glory.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal Warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has fought fiercely for the tribe, mastering the art of combat on the brutal battlefields.

BackstoryDef.title: Failed Contender
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once strove for a position of honor within the clan but failed to prove [PAWN_possessive] worth. The bitter taste of defeat still drives [PAWN_pronoun] to seek redemption.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal Warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has fought fiercely for the tribe, mastering the art of combat on the brutal battlefields.
